H0.text: English economist and physician Nicholas Barbon helped to pioneer which type of insurance in 1666. Life Insurance

H1.text: English economist and physician Nicholas Barbon helped to pioneer which type of insurance in 1666. Flood Insurance

H2.text: English economist and physician Nicholas Barbon helped to pioneer which type of insurance in 1666. Health Insurance

H3.text: English economist and physician Nicholas Barbon helped to pioneer which type of insurance in 1666. Fire Insurance

A4.text: In 1681, economist Nicholas Barbon and eleven associates established the first fire insurance company, the 'Insurance Office for Houses', at the back of the Royal Exchange to insure brick and frame homes.

A5.text: Fire insurance is documented in the EH.Net Encyclopedia of Economic History.
